57479.「ルコリア。今は 来客中だ。\n お前は ノックも まともにできないのか？:
Do you not see that I have a visitor, Lucolia?
Can't you even knock?

57480.「……ママから 話を聞いたの。\n 町の人のために 集会を開くんですってね。:
I heard from mom... You're holding a meeting
for everyone in town, aren't you?

57481.「い 忙しいとか 言い訳して まだ一度も\n 姉さんのお墓参り……行ってないじゃ:
You...you've never visited her grave. You're
always making excuses, saying you're too
busy...

57482.「私には 町長として なすべきことがある。\n 子供が 大人のやることに\n い:
I have a very important job as mayor. As a
child, you could never understand the
importance of an adult's work.

57484.「話のジャマだ。さあ 出ていけ。:
You're interrupting my conversation.
Leave. Now.

57485.「まったく 見苦しいところを\n お見せしましたな。\n 近頃 すっかり 生意気:
Good grief... I apologize you had to see that.
I've become quite brazen these days...

57486.「さあ 集会まで あまり時間がありません。\n 安らぎの香の調達を 頼みましたぞ:
There isn't much time before the meeting.
Please go and get that incense I asked for.

57487.「町の大人たちったら 子供たちの幽霊に\n 恨まれてるとか おびえちゃって バカ:
All the adults are scared because they think
the dead children despise them. Here...
You should read this.

57489.……今まで 大人に反抗してきた 私たちだけど\n自力で 生活するようになってから:
We've always rebelled against adults, but now
that we're living on our own...
we've come to appreciate them more.

57490.今は みんなで 毎日 ダーマ神殿に行って\n大人たちが 早く帰ってくるように\n:
Now we go to the Alltrades Abbey every day
to pray. We don't miss a single prayer, hoping
the adults will come home soon.

57491.もしかしたら 大人たちとは\nもう 二度と会えないのかもしれないけど\n祈りつづ:
We might not see the adults ever again, but if
we keep praying, then maybe one day...

57492.「……姉さんたちは 誰も 恨んでない。\n 毎日 ダーマ神殿で 静かにお祈りして:
They don't hate anyone... they quietly pray at
the Alltrades Abbey every day, hoping that
the adults will return.

57493.「町の大人たちは すっかり\n お祈りに行かなくなったのに……\n これじゃ ま:
And now, all of the adults have stopped
praying altogether... this is all so
backwards...

57494.「おお 安らぎの香を 持ってきてくれましたか。\n 集会に間に合ったようで 何よ:
Oh, good. You've brought the incense just
in time for the meeting. Can you please give
it to me?<yesno><close>

57495.「……おや どうしました。\n 安らぎの香がないと 集会が始められません。\n:
Huh... why not? We can't start the meeting
without it. Please give it to me.<yesno><close>

57496.<pc>は ブラト町長に\n安らぎの香を 渡した。:
<pc> gave Mayor Burat
the Peace Incense.

57497.「いや 助かりました。\n 今回は 特別ゲストも お招きしていますし\n この集:
Thank you. We have a special guest for the
meeting this time. I'm certain it will go
quite well.

57498.「ためになるお話が 聞けますし\n ぜひ あなたも参加していってください。:
The discussion should be quite informative
and enlightening. I hope you'll join us.

57499.町中の 大人たちが\n集会所に 集まってきた。:
Adults from all over town gathered at the
meeting place.

57500.「皆さん 本日は\n 突然の集会に お集まりいただき\n まことに ありがとうご:
Thank you all for joining us today in this
very unexpected meeting.

57501.「あの 古い教会の事故が起きてから\n この町は 深い悲しみに包まれ 幽霊の姿に:
Since the accident at the old church, the
signs of ghosts have most of you upset and
frightened. So...

57502.「……本日は そんな 皆さんを\n 悩みや 苦しみから解き放つため\n このぼく:
...that's why I've come here. Today, I will
free you from your sadness and your worries.

57503.「ぼくは サダク。\n 悪霊におびやかされている この町を\n 救うためにやって:
My name is Sadak. I'm a traveling medium, and
I have come to rid this town of those
terrorizing evil spirits.

57504.「ウ ウチの子を……悪霊ですって！？:
You're... you're calling our children evil
spirits?!

57505.「……そう 悪霊なのです。\n 恨みを抱いたまま 死んでしまった者の魂は\n 悪:
That's right. They are evil spirits. If one
dies harboring a grudge, their souls become
evil spirits who curse the living!

57506.「まずは 悪霊が入ってこないように\n 安らぎの香に ぼくが用意した聖灰を混ぜて:
First, I will purify this room by burning the
Peace Incense mixed with sacred ashes I've
prepared, so no evil spirits can enter here.

57509.「……さあ お子さんが 生きていた時のことを\n ようく 思いだしてみてください:
Now, I want you all to think back to when
your children were alive...

57510.「彼らが 何か恨みを抱くような\n きっかけは ありませんでしたか？\n 子供に:
Do they have any reason to hold a grudge? Do
you remember mistreating them?

57511.「わ 私……いつも 門限を厳しくして\n あまり 遊ばせてあげなかったわ……。:
I... always had a strict curfew and didn't let
them play much...

57512.「オ オレ……しょっちゅう\n 勉強しろって お説教してたから\n それが 子供:
I... I lectured them too much about needing
to study... maybe that pushed them over
the edge...

57513.「なるほど……。厳しい しつけに追い詰められ\n 町の子供たちは 大人を嫌い\n:
It all makes sense... hounded by strict
discipline, the children resented the adults
and holed up in that old church to play.

57514.「そして ガケ崩れにより 命を落とし\n この世に 恨みを抱いたまま 悪霊として:
And then, lost their lives when it collapsed,
and now aimlessly wander this world as evil
spirits with a grudge against the world...

57515.「このままだと 皆さんは 悪霊に呪われ続け\n いずれは 道連れに……。:
If this continues, the evil spirits will not
stop, eventually dragging you down with
them...

57516.「ですが ご安心ください。\n 皆さんが 悪霊におびやかされぬよう\n これから:
But do not worry... I will protect you. You
have no reason to be afraid of them anymore.

57518.「姉さんたちは 大人を 恨んでなんかいない。\n この日記帳を見れば わかるはず:
The children don't hate the adults. This
diary proves that...

57519.「……これは 姉さんの遺品。\n この世と あの世をつなぐ 特別な日記帳よ。:
This is my sister's diary. It's special, and
connects our world with the other world.

57520.「……中を読めば あの世のことが わかるわ。\n 教会の事故で 死んだ子供たちは:
You'll see what that world is like. The
children who died don't even realize that
they're dead...

57521.「子供しかいない 死の世界で\n どこかに消えてしまった 大人たちが\n 帰って:
In that world of death where only children
exist, they're all waiting for the adults to
return someday!

57522.「ルコリア！ また 私に逆らおうというのか！: You dare to defy me again, Lucolia?!

57523.「……わざわざ リゼロッタの字まで マネして\n ずいぶん 手の込んだ話を作った:
You just mimicked Lieselotte's handwriting and
made up this bogus story. Your childish
fantasies are driving me crazy!

57525.「さっさと 出ていけ！\n もう 二度と 私のジャマをするな！:
Get the hell out of here! And don't you ever
interrupt me again, you hear?!

57526.「まったく ウチの娘が とんだ失礼を……。\n 大切な集会に 水を差してしまいま:
I apologize for my daughter's rudeness...
She ruined this very important meeting.

57527.「いえいえ お気になさらず。\n 今日のところは ひとまず お開きにして\n 集:
No, no, don't worry. Let's adjourn for now.
We can continue the meeting again at a later
date.

57528.「目的は 果たせましたし\n 今日のところは これで失礼いたします。\n 悪霊の:
I've done what I needed to do, so you're all
free to go today. Leave the evil spirits to
me.

57529.大人たちは サダクの後に\nしたがうように 出ていった……。: All of the adults followed Sadak outside...

57530.「せっかく 準備を手伝っていただいたのに\n こんなカタチで 終わってしまい\n:
I apologize that the meeting ended up the way
it did after all the help you gave us.

57531.「サダクさんの言った通り 安らぎの香のおかげで\n 皆さん 途中までは リラック:
As Sadak said, thanks to that incense,
everyone was relaxed and attentive until
about halfway through...

57532.「これにこりず また\n 次の集会に ご参加ください。\n これは 今回のお礼で:
I hope this won't deter you from joining us
again. Please take this as my thanks.

87147.「あなたに 取ってきていただきたい\n 安らぎの香は リャナ荒涼地帯にいる\n:
The Peace Incense I would like you to fetch
for me is said to be dropped by
Elder Dragons in the Lyana Desolate.

87175.「そ そんなことより 姉さんのお墓に……\n お花のひとつでも 供えてきたらどう:
B...but that's not important. Why don't you
just go lay some flowers on Lieselotte's
grave?
